alert.note: Alert for Berks; Lehigh; Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 3:38AM EST until February 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation is expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to 1 to 3 inches. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...The New Jersey counties of Warren and Morris. The Pennsylvania counties of Berks, Lehigh and Northampton. * WHEN...From 7:00 PM this evening until 1:00 PM Friday. * IMPACTS...Local power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could become very difficult. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extra caution if traveling. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
